short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Respect is a free Google Chrome extension that can help make your writing more inclusive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Respect highlights insensitive, biased or offensive terms in your emails as you write. It explains the origin behind these terms to educate you on the implicit bias and suggests a synonym for the term to ensure your writing is inclusive.
